actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act so as to provide that, under certain circumstances, the entire area of a State will be redesignated as a single Professional Standards Review Organization area.

summary.text: Provides that, under the Social Security Act, the entire area of a State may be redesignated as a single Professional Standards Review Organization Area by majority vote of the doctors voting.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act so as to provide that, under certain circumstances, the entire area of a State will be redesignated as a single Professional Standards Review Organization area.
